settings.editor: I'm a WordPress developer based in Ethiopia, and I'm very passionate and dedicated to my work.

settings.description_text: Passionate WordPress developer crafting visually stunning and fully responsive websites for optimal user experiences.
Most common methods for designing websites that work well on desktop is responsive and adaptive design.
Proficient data entry specialist skilled in MS Word, MS Excel, and PDF handling. Ensuring accuracy and efficiency in data management tasks

settings.title: Master of Crafting Your Unique WordPress Website Designs

settings.editor: I'm Kassaye Siyum, a seasoned WordPress Developer and Data Center Engineer with more than 2 years of hands-on experience. My expertise lies in seamlessly blending creativity and functionality to deliver captivating websites on the WordPress platform. In addition to my proficiency in WP, I boast a solid background in networking, adept at configuration and adeptly troubleshooting to ensure smooth operations.

With a focus on WordPress development, I bring expertise in designing websites that are not only visually stunning but also function seamlessly on desktop. Leveraging responsive and adaptive design approaches, I ensure an optimal user experience across all devices.

eael_fg_gallery_items.eael_fg_gallery_item_content: Designed and developed a dynamic website highlighting premium plastic products
Smart Classrooms and Structural Cabling Systems for an advanced learning environment.
Precision and Efficiency in the meticulous handling of information.
Installing IP CCTV camera systems at Wollo University in MAU
The E-commerce website facilitates buying and selling across diverse categories.
I extracted the data from image to MS Word | notepad with 100% accuracy.

settings.title: I'm always evolving my skills to stay current.

settings.editor: my focus lies in implementing responsive and adaptive design strategies for seamless desktop experiences.
Most common methods for designing websites that work well on desktop is responsive and adaptive design
Web design refers to the design of websites that are displayed on the internet. It usually refers to the user experience aspects of website development
Drawing upon my expertise as a meticulous Data Entry Specialist, I aim to guarantee precision and efficiency in the meticulous handling of information.
Experienced in configuring and installing network devices like routers and switches, with a specialty in deploying fiber optics and node work for robust connectivity solutions.
Proficient in utilizing MS Office tools. Skilled in creating professional documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and managing email communications efficiently using these software applications.
Most common methods for designing websites that work well on desktop is responsive and adaptive design

settings.testimonial_content: Kassaye was hired to create a corporate identity. We were very pleased with the work done. She has a lot of experience and is very concerned about the needs of client.

kassaye is the best WordPress developer we've worked with! They created an exceptional website that perfectly reflects our brand. Their expertise, attention to detail, and professionalism made the entire process seamless and enjoyable.

settings.editor: Please feel free to reach out to me anytime. Whether you prefer to fill out the form below or give me a call, I'm available to assist you around the clock, seven days a week.

settings.html:
<style>
    html,body{
        overflow-x: hidden;
    }
    .logo-object{
            animation: logo-object 4s linear infinite;
        }
        @keyframes logo-object{
            0%{
                transform: translateY(-7px);
            }
            50%{
                transform: translateY(7px);
            }
            100%{
                transform: translateY(-7px);
            }
        }
        
        
    
    .header{
        right: 0;
        left: 0;
    }
    
    
    
    .top-image-box .elementor-image-box-img{
        width: 90px !important;
    }
    
    
    .image-gallery .eael-gallery-grid-item img{
        min-height: 260px;
    }
    .image-gallery .eael-filter-gallery-control ul {
        margin: 0px 0px 50px 0px;
    }
    
    
    .testmonial .elementor-testimonial-content{
        position: relative;
        padding-top: 70px;
        margin-bottom: 35px;
    }
    .testmonial .elementor-testimonial-content:before{
        content: "";
        height: 40px;
        width: 65px;
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translate(-50%);
        background-image: url('https://tutorialic.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/quat.png');
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-size: auto 100%;
    }
    .progress-bar .eael-progressbar-line, .progress-bar .eael-progressbar-line-fill{
        border-radius: 50px;
    }
    .contact-info .elementor-icon-box-icon{
        height: 88px;
        width: 88px;
        background: #fedfd7;
        border-radius: 50%;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
    }
    .contact-info.email .elementor-icon-box-icon{
        background: #ddf5e6;
    }
    .contact-info.phone .elementor-icon-box-icon{
        background: #ece8fd
    }
    .contact-info .elementor-icon-box-title{
        margin-bottom: 10px;
        margin-top: 5px;
    }
    .counter .elementor-counter{
        display: flex;
    }
    .counter .elementor-counter-title{
        text-align: left;
        margin-left: 20px;
        margin-top: 8px;
    }
    
    
    .services .red-color{
        color: #F75023;
    }
    .services .elementor-image-box-title{
        margin-top: 5px;
    }
    .to-top{
        position: relative;
    }
    .to-top:before{
        content: "";
        height: 1px;
        width: 60px;
        background: #000;
        position: absolute;
        top: 80px;
        right: -9px;
        transform: rotate(90deg);
    }
    
    
    @media (max-width: 1600px) {
        .counter .elementor-counter-title{
            margin-top: 3px;
        }
    }
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .image-gallery .eael-filter-gallery-control ul {
        margin: 0px 0px 35px 0px;
    }
    .contact-info .elementor-icon-box-icon{
        height: 60px;
        width: 60px;
        padding-top: 0px;
    }
}
    @media (max-width: 767px) {
        .testmonial .elementor-testimonial-content:before{
        height: 25px;
        width: 40px;
    }
     .testmonial .elementor-testimonial-content{
        position: relative;
        padding-top: 45px;
    }
    .contact-info .elementor-icon-box-icon{
        padding-top: 17px;
    }
    .services .elementor-image-box-img{
        width: 90px !important;
    }
}
        
    
</style>
